battleship2000.programlogic.domain.ship

Class ShipPart

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship2000.programlogic.domain.ship.ShipPart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hittable, Movable

    public class ShipPart
extends Object
implements Movable, Hittable
    The manifestation of a Ship in the game is a series of ShipParts that can be placed in Squares of a Table.

    Note! The Ship's direction defines which ShipPart is the Front and which one is the Rear.

    Author:
    Petri Kallio
